data.title: Specials and Events - INSP TV
data.meta_description: Current and Upcoming Specials and Events on INSP TV
data.text:
Double Trouble: Dynamic Duos Celebration

What’s better than seeing a famous star in an action-packed Western? Seeing two of your favorite stars! You’re in for double the fun as these movies bring together lots of beloved stars in some INSP fan favorite movies.

Enjoy sizzling entertainment with beloved and dynamic duos every Friday evening in August! Watch two brothers try to rescue their kidnapped family (Tom Selleck and Sam Elliott) … The Lone Ranger and Tonto investigate a land war brewing between Indians and settlers (Clayton Moore and Jay Silverheels) … A rancher struggles to do the right thing for his widowed daughter-in-law and granddaughter. (Robert Redford and Morgan Freeman) … Marshal Matt Dillon and Miss Kitty face an unknown enemy (James Arness and Amanda Blake) … A cattle baron grapples with his feisty wife (John Wayne and Maureen O’Hara) ….

You’ll love all the drama, suspense, intrigue and pulse-pounding excitement! Plus, you’ll spot loads of other beloved stars from days gone by along the way.

Are you ready for an unforgettable ride each week? Saddle up for the next five Fridays—it’s going to be a thrilling ride!

FRI, AUG 16

8:30PM ET: An Unfinished Life

FRI, AUG 23

9PM ET: Gunsmoke: Return to Dodge

FRI, AUG 30

8PM ET: McLintock!

The Bob Squad: Birthday Movie Weekend

What do you get when you take three acclaimed movie stars, all named Robert, who were all born in August? The Bob Squad: Birthday Movie Weekend! Join us as we celebrate the birthday boys: Robert Taylor (Aug. 5), Robert Mitchum (Aug. 6) and Robert Redford (Aug. 18). Undeniably talented, handsome, and charismatic—and each a Hollywood legend is his own right—this Bob Squad comes your way in three great Westerns you won’t want to miss!

You’ll find riveting stories about an elderly rancher struggling to protect his widowed daughter-in-law and grandson while still grieving for his son; a reformed outlaw whose past might just have caught up with him; and a roaring river that threatens to kill a farmer, his son, and the feisty saloon singer stranded with them.

All three movies feature legendary stars such as Robert Redford, Morgan Freeman, Robert Taylor, Julie London, John Cassavetes, Robert Mitchum, Marilyn Monroe, Rory Calhoun and more.

This is one birthday party you don’t want to miss! Get your fill of the Bob Squad birthday celebration—it’s delicious, calorie free, and rip-roaring good fun!

FRI, AUG 16

8:30PM ET: An Unfinished Life

SAT, AUG 17

9PM ET: Saddle the Wind

SAT, AUG 18

10PM ET: River of No Return

Fess on the Frontier: Fess Parker Birthday Event

INSP fans have an enduring soft spot for Fess Parker—and why not? The beloved star of the TV shows Davy Crockett and Daniel Boone made coonskin caps all the rage and delighted an entire generation of children who will always remember him.

Fess Parker’s birthday was Aug. 16 … so we thought we’d have a birthday celebration in honor of him. And here’s some more good news—you’re invited!

Fess is at his finest in these three special programs that feature everybody’s favorite outdoorsman and revolutionary: Daniel Boone. Come along as he blazes his Wilderness Road through the High Cumberland from North Carolina through Tennessee and off to Kentucky. It won’t be easy, since he’ll have to fight loyalists, pursuers, and his own greedy men along the way.

Finally, enjoy the movie that started a national craze and had children singing “Davy! Davy Crockett” as Fess brings to life the legendary explorer in the original coonskin cap. Davy and his friend, George Russell, fight for survival on the frontier … Davy serves in Congress … and then meets up with George again to fight in the battle of the Alamo.

This birthday celebration will make you feel like a kid again. So, go ahead: put on your old coonskin cap and follow Daniel Boone’s travels, sing the “Ballad of Davy Crockett,” and raise a glass in a birthday salute to the one and only Fess Parker!

SUN, AUG 18

12PM ET: Daniel Boone – The High Cumberland: Part 1

1PM ET: Daniel Boone – The High Cumberland: Part 2

2PM ET: Davy Crockett: King of the Wild Frontier
